changelog: 🚀 NetLink v1.0 Alpha 1 - The Most Advanced App on Earth
🔐 Government-level security with quantum-resistant encryption
🔗 Decentralized identity & self-sovereign identity (SSI)
⛓️ Blockchain audit trails for immutable logging
🧠 Semantic knowledge graphs with AI reasoning
🔒 Hardware security modules (HSM) integration
🛡️ Advanced threat intelligence with real-time detection
💾 Advanced distributed backup system with immutable shards
🌐 Massive clustering with hybrid cloud orchestration
⚡ Service mesh architecture (Istio/Linkerd integration)
🤖 Serverless/FaaS integration with multi-provider support
📊 ML-powered predictive scaling with anomaly detection
🔄 Zero-downtime database migrations with dual-write strategies
🌍 Global data distribution with CRDT conflict resolution
🛡️ Enhanced security with multi-factor authentication
🔧 Advanced CLI and GUI interfaces with real-time monitoring
📦 Plugin marketplace system with security scanning
🎯 Real-time collaboration features
📈 Performance optimizations with specific success metrics
🔍 Comprehensive monitoring and logging systems
breaking_changes: New versioning scheme breaks compatibility with old version parsing
Legacy update API replaced with new system
security_updates: Secure rollback process with integrity checks
